Solution:   Convert test cases to new style. (Yegappan Lakshmanan,
            closes #6638)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3d945cc925dddb99a1ee86ec194b5b95221c72d7|patch 8.2.1380: Vim9: return type of getreg() is always a string>
patch 8.2.1380: Vim9: return type of getreg() is always a string

Problem:    Vim9: return type of getreg() is always a string.
Solution:   Use list of strings when there are three arguments. (closes #6633)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1380: Vim9: return type of getreg() is always a string · vim/vim@3d945cc
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1380: Vim9: return type of getreg() is always a string · vim/vim@3d945cc
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: return type of getreg() is always a string. Solution: Use list of strings when there are three arguments. (closes #6633)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/56b8dc331dc7f499c8221ed7d1c7795ad5e3bdeb|patch 8.2.1381: MS-Windows: crash with Python 3.5 when stdin is redir…>
patch 8.2.1381: MS-Windows: crash with Python 3.5 when stdin is redirected

Problem:    MS-Windows: crash with Python 3.5 when stdin is redirected.
Solution:   Reconnect stdin. (Yasuhiro Matsumoto, Ken Takata, closes #6641)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1381: MS-Windows: crash with Python 3.5 when stdin is redir… · vim/vim@56b8dc3

attachments.text: …ected Problem: MS-Windows: crash with Python 3.5 when stdin is redirected. Solution: Reconnect stdin. (Yasuhiro Matsumoto, Ken Takata, closes #6641)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8e1986e3896cc8c2a05fc6291a39ebb275e1cebf|patch 8.2.1382: Vim9: using :import in filetype plugin gives an error>
patch 8.2.1382: Vim9: using :import in filetype plugin gives an error

Problem:    Vim9: using :import in filetype plugin gives an error.
Solution:   Allow commands with the EX_LOCK_OK flag. (closes #6636)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1382: Vim9: using :import in filetype plugin gives an error · vim/vim@8e1986e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1382: Vim9: using :import in filetype plugin gives an error · vim/vim@8e1986e
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: using :import in filetype plugin gives an error. Solution: Allow commands with the EX_LOCK_OK flag. (closes #6636)
